page.shortlink: grid component client side cannewrowsshow event
page.description: Fires when the user tries to show the new record rows in the Grid Part. The Grid must be configured to show new record rows on demand. If the event returns false, the action is cancelled.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: rowsInEditMode
property.description: The number of existing Grid rows that are currently in edit mode.
